body:
Last time I made a post like this was 7 months ago, and I only got like 3 questions asked then. 
Well, now everyone probably knows me better, so ask away! :)
body_tagged:

title: Pav's AMA

replies.body: How many maps have you made in total for Avicus (including ones you contributed building in, if there are any)?
replies.body_tagged: How many maps have you made in total for Avicus (including ones you contributed building in, if there are any)?

replies.body: Counting from my very first map, 18 total maps from all game-modes. Well... 19 if you count one joke map that I made :P
replies.body_tagged: Counting from my very first map, 18 total maps from all game-modes. Well... 19 if you count one joke map that I made :P

reply_to.body: How many maps have you made in total for Avicus (including ones you contributed building in, if there are any)?
reply_to.body_tagged: How many maps have you made in total for Avicus (including ones you contributed building in, if there are any)?

replies.body:
Why the name Pavlo?
When did you get mapdev?
replies.body_tagged:
Why the name Pavlo?
When did you get mapdev?

replies.body: How did you come up with that name?
replies.body_tagged: How did you come up with that name?

replies.body:
@Aerosmith:
I love Pavlova, and my irl name is quite similar to Pavlova. My friends also call me Pavlo, Pavlov, Pablo, Pavlova etc. All those names were taken in MC except Pavlo. :D
And I got MapDev almost 3 months ago now.

@Regendary:
WHAT!!??!?!

@DaFrozenBlaze
Definitely Pavlo, I was soooooo bad at PvP back then, I'm still prety average, but better.

@Fuseh:
Look at Aerosmiths question answer :)
